name: Saber Boss Fight
description:
The Saber Iggy guards the launch pad for the space shuttle. The hero really needs to get out of this planet. Try to evade various attacks by dashing and jumping. Survive the encounter and shoot weak points one by one to defeat this monstrous creature! 

Controls:

  • Use WASD to control the character
  • Press Space to jump
  • Click LMB to shoot
  • Press Shift for dash

Prototype created by Daniil Chebotkov

Game Engine - Unreal Engine 4

Credits:

  • Paragon: Iggy & Scorch by Epic Games
  • Lowpoly_reflector by hellotaia
  • SDF Robo Progress Bars by Krystian Komisarek
  • Sci Fi Weapons Dark by Ying Pei Games
  • Ballistics FX by Cubit Studios
  • Sounds (1, 2, 3)
  • Soundtrack by Lineage - Hunters Villiage
